title: Can't access account
body: My friend can't log in to LoL account. He wrote his password correct, on the right region, didn't use capslock. He even tried to use Forgot Password, but riot didn't recognize his account. He also wrote a ticket but got no answer. I don't think he got hacked cuz he hasn't been logged since he lost his acc. What is happening?!?

replies.body: Glad to hear your friend submitted a ticket! Account Recoveries can be a long process, but if provided with all the correct information the specialist will be able to help them obtain their account again.
I have the same issue. I also haven't gotten a response from riot.
